patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,46 @@
+MODEL:
+  BACKBONE: bert-base-uncased
+  PATH: /root/autodl-tmp/models/bert-base-uncased
+  
+ADAPTER:
+  TRAIN: adapter/para/tl/biomedical/biomedical_ner_bert-base-uncased_inter
+  EVAL: None
+  ENABLE: True
+
+DATA:
+  SRC_DATASET: biomedical
+  BIOMEDICAL:
+    SIM_METHOD: None
+    DATASETS: None
+  TGT_DATASET: chemdner_pse
+  GRANULARITY: para
+
+TRAIN:
+  SRC_EPOCHS: 100
+  TGT_EPOCHS: 80
+  SRC_BATCH_SIZE: 64
+  BATCH_SIZE: 16
+  SRC_LR: 0.0001
+  LR: 0.0001
+  ORACLE: False
+  TWO_STAGE: False
+  SEED: 42
+
+EVAL:
+  OVERWRITE: True
+  BATCH_SIZE: 128
+
+SRC_LOSS:
+  NAME: CrossEntropy
+
+TGT_LOSS:
+  NAME: CE_MS
+  LAMBDA: 0.1
+  MULTI_SIMILARITY_LOSS:
+    SCALE_POS: 2.0
+    SCALE_NEG: 5.0
+
+OUTPUT:
+  ADAPTER_SAVE_DIR: adapter/para/tl
+  HEAD_SAVE_DIR: head/para/tl
+  RESULT_SAVE_DIR: results/para/tl
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
MODEL:
  BACKBONE: bert-base-uncased
  PATH: PATH_TO_BERT
  
ADAPTER:
  TRAIN: adapter/para/tl/biomedical/biomedical_ner_bert-base-uncased_inter
  EVAL: None
  ENABLE: True

DATA:
  SRC_DATASET: biomedical
  BIOMEDICAL:
    SIM_METHOD: None
    DATASETS: None
  TGT_DATASET: chemdner_pse
  GRANULARITY: para

TRAIN:
  SRC_EPOCHS: 100
  TGT_EPOCHS: 80
  SRC_BATCH_SIZE: 64
  BATCH_SIZE: 16
  SRC_LR: 0.0001
  LR: 0.0001
  ORACLE: False
  TWO_STAGE: False
  SEED: 42

EVAL:
  OVERWRITE: True
  BATCH_SIZE: 128

SRC_LOSS:
  NAME: CrossEntropy

TGT_LOSS:
  NAME: CE_MS
  LAMBDA: 0.1
  MULTI_SIMILARITY_LOSS:
    SCALE_POS: 2.0
    SCALE_NEG: 5.0

OUTPUT:
  ADAPTER_SAVE_DIR: adapter/para/tl
  HEAD_SAVE_DIR: head/para/tl
  RESULT_SAVE_DIR: results/para/tl
